extendedInfo.description: Password Keepox is a simple application designed for managing your password in a secure way on your Android device. There is good user experience with BlackBerry Password Keeper. All your passwords will be protected by a master password and encrypted by 256Bit AES encryption algorithm. Support export/import data to SD Card, and sync with Dropbox.The FREE edition is ad supported. You can also select PAID edition that is ad-free.Features:* Password info protection by 256Bit AES encrypted.* Data self-destruct.* Direct website access.* Automatic password generation.* Automatically/manually clipboard clear.* Export/Import unencrypted XML file.* Export/Import encrypted EXML file.* Export/Import unencrypted EXCEL(xls) file.* Support sync with Dropbox.* Support searching password record.* Support sorting.* Support Language: English, Chinese, Japanese.For detailed release notes, please access www.ciyingsoft.comThanks every body for sending crash information.NOTE:Please BACKUP your data to unencrypted XML file before each upgrade.Keywordsï¼Password Keeper Password Manager Secure Data Vault Password Safe Password Vault Secure Security Password Password Keeper Password Store Protector Wallet Encryption Dropbox å¯ç  ä¿æ¤ ä¿¡æ¯ å®å¨ å å¯ ãã¹ã¯ã¼ãä¿è­· æå·å æå ± ã»ã­ã¥ãªãã£

reviews.title: Great app!
reviews.comment: I\'ve depended on this app for all my password storage needs and it has never failed me.
reviews.author: Jesus Rodriguez

reviews.title: Okay, but a little unpolished
reviews.comment: I have been looking for a product  that would provide sync between devices and desktops.  This has a weak dropbox sync for devices, but very in impressive.  The dropbox sync seems to be common among a lot of these, but I never liked it.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great start.
reviews.comment: Needs some way to transfer user ids & passwords to browser.
reviews.author: Henry Herron

reviews.title: Sucks
reviews.comment: Twice this app has erased my passwords. Don\'t rely on it.
reviews.author: Max Power

reviews.title: Loved it, now hate it
reviews.comment: This app has never failed me until recently as it will not let me log in. Lost all my passwords.

reviews.comment: I like this app its very helpful it works great.

reviews.comment: Important tool to remember my passwords since my stroke. I just wish it had a security question since I need to change passwords often.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Had this once before under another name with my original HTC Hero, glad to have it again with my Motorola Droid!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Works great on my Xoom
reviews.comment: This app does exactly what it promises to do. I have tried others but I can\'t find another that allows you to copy info to the clipboard. Two suggestions to put here because there seems to be no way to contact the developer either here or on his website. 1. When pasting a password the clipboard should be cleared. 2. The icon should be cleaned up. It looks like it was poorly cut out from a white background. It shows a jagged white frame around the icon. I\'ll certainly keep using this app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Lost without it
reviews.comment: I would be lost without this. Not fond of the ads, but small price to pay for free!
reviews.author: A Google User
